text: Mbe mbara khaŋ na nzuai, “Ndu Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma nzuai mbugum, ndu taagip zumgum kha gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve hɨrga bigi bun mbe suaŋgirga. Ndu kha nuianan ki ŋgui bakɨvi, gu mbarkɨrga fhavi, mbarkɨrga kaar nzuai gumgi gu mbigi, gu kha nuianan ŋgui vhɨrve gari gumgir pani zam, ndu mba buni bun mbe suaŋgiri.”
